unnormalised: Arre, India ani Pakistan-cho match 15/10/2024-ak asa, baraabar? Aasha kartaam 02/09/2024-ak zal'lea match-antlea bhaxen paus poddonam; to puren bud'dlo!
normalised: Arre, India ani Pakistan pandhra October don hazaar chovisiek asa, baraabar? Aasha karta September don hazaar chovisiek zal'lea matshi bhaxen paus poddonk favo na; tem poornn dhuvun gel'lem!
text: Arre, India ani Pakistan-cho match 15/10/2024-ak asa, baraabar? Aasha kartaam 02/09/2024-ak zal'lea match-antlea bhaxen paus poddonam; to puren bud'dlo!
